channel.title: (Project Pearl) how to make the hoverbox for the magics
channel.description:
you know when you hover over somthing it says EXAMPLE: Home teleport, No runes, Teleport's you to home in a litle box... Project Pearl doesnt have that how do i add... (SEARCHED ALL OVER FOR ABOUT 6 HOURS) Post how too, or link too tut pl0xxx
AND, iknow its dumb but wont work dclaws drain 75 of spec.. i dont kno how too change too 50.. (im not dumb just cant find/it wont work if i do)
[s]AND how to change what it says when u hover over anything at top of screen..[/s]

for d claws search the code 8002 in client.java and if u see specail Attack change it
